text: With Bahi Cosmetics, an all - natural skincare and cosmetics company for women of every color, 21 - year - old Danielle Bahi is on a mission to disrupt the beauty space. Essence magazine recently called Bahi Cosmetics ` ` the brand to watch.'' This founder, who was born on the Ivory Coast of Africa and came to the United States when she was 7 - years - old, started the organic, vegan and cruelty - free company in her college dorm room two years ago. Travel has played a role in Bahi's success. Besides using ingredients that she sources at farmers markets — olives, sunflowers, almonds, hazelnut oil — Bahi hosts what she calls Greyscale events around the country.
